sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaCreditCard, FaShoppingBag, FaUser, FaSearch, FaAward, FaEnvelope, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaEye, FaTag, FaStore, FaPalette } from 'react-icons/fa'; import AynextLogo from '../components/AynextLogo'; import SimpleHoodieDesigner from '../components/SimpleHoodieDesigner'; const Home = () => { const [showHoodieDesigner, setShowHoodieDesigner] = useState(false); const features = [ { icon: , title: "VÊTEMENTS DE CONTACT", description: "Approvisionnement exclusif auprès des fournisseurs officiels" }, { icon: , title: "PAIEMENT SÉCURISÉ à partir de 0€", description: "Paiement sécurisé & Garanties" }, { icon: , title: "Entreprise Familiale depuis 2024", description: "Boutique de mode depuis 2024" }, { icon: , title: "VÊTEMENTS et ACCESSOIRES", description: "Qualité premium garantie" }, { icon: , title: "+ DE 15 000 REFERENCES", description: "+ de 100 marques en stock" } ]; return (
{/* Modern Header */}

AYNEXT

BOUTIQUE DIGITAL

{/* Modern background elements */}
{/* Modern Hero Section */}
{/* Left Content */}

VÊTEMENTS DE MODE POUR TOUS

+ de 15000 références

{/* Modern Category Buttons */}
FEMME HOMME ENFANT UNISEXE
{/* Test Button for Hoodie Designer */}
{/* Right Content - Modern Model Image */}
{/* Modern tag effect */}
{/* Modern accent lines */}
{/* Modern decorative elements */}
{/* Modern Features Section */}
{features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* Modern Boutique Section */}

VOTRE BOUTIQUE EN LIGNE

Vêtements de mode. Accessoires & Chaussures

{/* Modern Image Gallery */}

COLLECTION MODE

Découvrez nos dernières tendances

STYLE MODERNE

Pour un look contemporain

{/* Hoodie Designer Modal */} {showHoodieDesigner && ( setShowHoodieDesigner(false)} /> )}
); }; export default Home;
